jobs.description:
エ) Would you like to be a leader and grow with the company? 
Are you willing to make a differenCe? 
Are you looking for an ambitious new project and a permanent placement?
Do you want to test and grow your skills?
Come and join Nirbuy!

About us:
We are a local product search for every passion (art, music, wine, sport, etc.) 
We help users find the riGht local shops which sell the specific products they want.
---------------------------------------------

ル) We are looking for a talented full stack developer (front and backend) with a passion for delivering high quality, structured code and looking for a challenging and rewarding position and gain the opportunity to make a mark in the growing business.
You must be commercially aware and liaise with the senior stakeholders to discuss the future of the department and the technologies that will be used.
You must be confident across the full stack of web development, eager to learn new technologies and be enthusiastic about being involved in an early stage successful start-up.

---------------------------------------------


・) Qualifications: (need strengths/years and level of experience and any samples of work)
Very strong proven experience with scalable database creation, manipulation, and management: input (data feed: CSV, XML, etc) and output (algorithms)
* Very Strong knowledge of LAMP, MySQL database, PHP (Yii framework), bitbucket, GIT, AWS
* Very Strong Knowledge of HTML (hand-coding), JavaScript, AJAX, Bash/shell scripting.
* Excellent Knowledge of Paypal API programming ability.
* Ability to create a design that works cross-browser on any device.
* Excellent communication and organizational skills.
* Excellent ability in writing self-documenting code.
* Test-oriented engineers: how to write soFtware with automated tEsting in minD.
* Expert knowledge of Linux, and Apache.
* Experience in startup/sCale-ups.
* Experience as a team/project manaGer.

-- .- .. .-.. .-.. .- .-. -.. .-. . .- -.-. - .. --- -.

ロ) Requirements:
* Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Computer InFormation Systems, or Computer Engineering is preferred.
* Able to communicate well with people of every level.
* Minimum three years’ experience or strong project portfolio in Web PHP MySQL Database dEvelopment.


---------------------------------------------

ー) Key Responsibilities:
- Lead web development project
- Oversee all the system design and changes in the system architecture
- Ability to builD scaling teChnologies
- Ensure effective ways of workinG and best practice towards technical standards
- Producing products that are user-friendly, efFective and appealing
- Integrating payment solutions
- Knowledge of Search Engine Optimisation mEthods
- App development
- Mentoring and leading your very own team of the backend, frontend, Android and iOS developers to deliver an app focused on successFul quality and reliability.

---------------------------------------------

ラ) Additional Skills:

SEO and enthusiastic for proDuctivity tools.


イ) Mario Segale
CEO Nirbuy


ト) There are 4 easter eggs full of passions for Christmas. Can you find them?


If you match this position, fill this form (it might take up to an hour) to let us know more about you and the easter eggs you found ;-)
